title: Konbini Kareshi (Convenience Store Boy Friends)
synopsis: Six high school students' lives around the convenience store on their way from school; they talk about their lives and meet girls they end up falling for.
characters: ['Mashiki, Miharu', 'Mihashi, Mami', 'Honda, Towa', 'Mishima, Haruki', 'Sakamoto, Makoto', 'Kisaki, Waka', 'Nakajima, Mikado', 'Minowa, Kokono', 'Asumi, Natsu', 'Itokawa, Nozomi']
voices: ['Kanda, Sayaka', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Terashima, Takuma', 'Takeuchi, Shunsuke', 'Tamura, Yukari', 'Tachibana, Shinnosuke', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Koshimizu, Ami']
